title: I cant install LOL
body: The setup wizard begins installing the game but when I go to launch it the league logo comes up but the patcher/client never appears. I check the task manager and league is not there. I've reinstalled the game multiple times and reset my comp but it  never will open the client. Please help me.

replies.body: Sounds like your pc may not have the right admin settings to allow League to run. Check out this [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide if you need some help with getting those setup!
